    • Property Detail

      • removeSource

        public EntityAssociationBuilder removeSourceProperty
        Remove the property on the source end. This implies that the association is entirely determined by the target entity linking back to the source entity.

      • removeTarget

        public EntityAssociationBuilder removeTargetProperty
        Remove the property on the target end. This implies that the association is entirely determined by the source entity linking to the target entity, without a back link.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityAssociationBuilder

        public EntityAssociationBuilder(String name)

    • Method Detail

      • targetEntityType

        public EntityAssociationBuilder targetEntityType(Class<?> targetEntityType)
        Set the target entity type for this association. This type must be registered in the EntityRegistry.
        Parameters:
        targetEntityType - type of the target entity
        Returns:
        current builder

      • sourceProperty

        public EntityAssociationBuilder sourceProperty(String sourceProperty)
        Set the name of the property on the source end. The property should be found in the corresponding EntityPropertyRegistry of the source EntityConfiguration.

        Should not be null. If you want to remove the source property explicitly, use removeSourceProperty().

        Parameters:
        sourceProperty - name, not null
        Returns:
        current builder

      • removeSourceProperty

        public EntityAssociationBuilder removeSourceProperty()
        Remove the property on the source end. This implies that the association is entirely determined by the target entity linking back to the source entity.

      • targetProperty

        public EntityAssociationBuilder targetProperty(String targetProperty)
        Set the name of the property on the target end. The property should be found in the corresponding EntityPropertyRegistry of the target EntityConfiguration.

        Should not be null. If you want to remove the target property explicitly, use removeTargetProperty().

        Parameters:
        targetProperty - name, not null
        Returns:
        current builder

      • removeTargetProperty

        public EntityAssociationBuilder removeTargetProperty()
        Remove the property on the target end. This implies that the association is entirely determined by the source entity linking to the target entity, without a back link.

      • show

        public EntityAssociationBuilder show()
        Ensures the association will not be labeled as hidden for UI implementations.
        Returns:
        current builder

      • hide

        public EntityAssociationBuilder hide()
        Ensures the association will be labeled as hidden for UI implementations.
        Returns:
        current builder

      • autoHide

        public EntityAssociationBuilder autoHide()
        Ensures the configuration will be labeled as hidden for UI implementations if any of its participating configurations is hidden. This is the default behavior if the property is not specified explicitly on the association.
        Returns:
        current builder

      • hidden

        public EntityAssociationBuilder hidden(Boolean hidden)
        Should the EntityAssociation be hidden from UI implementations. This property can be considered a hint for automatically generated user interfaces.
        Parameters:
        hidden - True if the association should be hidden from UI.
        Returns:
        current builder

      • view

        public ViewBuilder view(String name)
        Description copied from class: AbstractAttributesAndViewsBuilder
        Returns a AbstractSimpleEntityViewBuilder instance for the view with the given name. If there is already another builder type for that view, an exception will be thrown.
        Specified by:
        view in class AbstractAttributesAndViewsBuilder<EntityAssociationBuilder,MutableEntityAssociation>
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the view for which to retrieve a builder.
        Returns:
        builder instance

      • listView

        public ListViewBuilder listView()
        Description copied from class: AbstractAttributesAndViewsBuilder
        Returns the default list view builder for the entity being configured. A default list view is usually available.
        Specified by:
        listView in class AbstractAttributesAndViewsBuilder<EntityAssociationBuilder,MutableEntityAssociation>
        Returns:
        builder instance
